metadata.name: Perfection is an Illusion
metadata.description:
This digital painting discusses the idea of perfection and the struggles related to it.

The demonic face is that of the person who has lost themselves in the pursuit of perfection, fallen into great depths of self hatred, so they only see something evil or demonic which disgusts them.

Fairy-Fantasy face is that of a person who is engrossed in unattainable perfection, trapped in a fantasy, they are unable to accept reality.

Top face, is that of assumed achievement of perfection of another person, others are usually ignorant of imperfections that person has, they might be hidden, in this case, the achieved perfection is nothing but a grand illusion.

Last face is that of a person who knows their reality and satisfied with themselves, they are not lost in fruitless pursuit of attaining perfection.

Image size: 3048x3048px.
Time taken: 30hrs.
Made on Procreate.
